questions.question: What is the past of run'?
Which sentence is not correct?
options: I screamed when you scream since they screamed for ice cream.
I screamed when you screamed because they screamed for ice cream.
I scream when you screams because they screamed for ice creamed.
Ice screamed when ice screamed because they screamed for scream.
questions.answer: I screamed when you screamed because they screamed for ice cream.
